### About Me

I am a Data Analyst with a diverse skill set that ranges from statistical analysis to cutting-edge data mining techniques. Currently, as a Data Quality Specialist, I ensure data integrity and design automate the communication of data quality issues to stakeholders.

In 2025, I am focused on advancing my skills in process automation and data engineering to transition into a Data Engineering role. This year's projects aim to develop competencies in:

-   Advanced ETL workflows, including extracting data from APIs and leveraging pipelines in Azure Data Factory

-   Automating data pipelines for efficient data extraction and processing

-   SQL database management and query optimization

-   CI/CD to streamline pipeline testing and management
:::
